H0.text: What is the name for the point in the lunar orbit when the moon is nearest to the earth. Perigeeon

H1.text: What is the name for the point in the lunar orbit when the moon is nearest to the earth. Lunaria

H2.text: What is the name for the point in the lunar orbit when the moon is nearest to the earth. Proxima

H3.text: What is the name for the point in the lunar orbit when the moon is nearest to the earth. Apses

A4.text: For a satellite of Earth, including the Moon, the point of least distance is the perigee

A5.text: For objects in lunar orbit, the point of least distance are called the pericynthion
